Original: This request is from Wynne at the
Berund Atelier. Have you heard the
rumor flying around about fairies?
[Page]
They allegedly have been seen on the
[Color:5]second floor[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Echoing Library[Color:0]
at [Color:5]night[Color:0].
[Page]
She wants you to find the truth of
these rumors. Perhaps you could bring
back a bellflower?
[Page]
Oh, yes... When she posted it, she
seemed to want to hand something to
me. However...
[Page]
Before I could accept it, she ran off.
If you are curious, I suggest visiting
the Berund Atelier to make inquiries.
Translation: This request is from Wynne at the
Berund Atelier. Have you heard the
rumor flying around about fairies?
[Page]
They allegedly have been seen on the
[Color:5]second floor[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Echoing Library[Color:0]
at [Color:5]night[Color:0].
[Page]
She wants you to find the truth of
these rumors. Perhaps you could bring
back a bellflower?
[Page]
Oh, yes... When she posted it, she
seemed to want to hand something to
me. However...
[Page]
Before I could accept it, she ran off.
If you are curious, I suggest visiting
the Berund Atelier to make inquiries.

Original: Welcome back. So? Were there indeed
fairies in the Library?
[Page]
Oh, what a precious flower. So it was
a mistake? To me, this flower's radiant
pollen is impressive enough.
[Page]
I admit to being curious, so I did
some research of my own after you
left this establishment.
[Page]
In some folklore, fairies hide in the
bellflowers. What a captivating story.
[Page]
It's a little sad, but I am sure she
will understand if you take that
flower to her.
[Page]
Now then, I again thank you for your
hard work. Here is the reward, and I
hope to have your help next time.
Translation: Welcome back. So? Were there indeed
fairies in the Library?
[Page]
Oh, what a precious flower. So it was
a mistake? To me, this flower's radiant
pollen is impressive enough.
[Page]
I admit to being curious, so I did
some research of my own after you
left this establishment.
[Page]
In some folklore, fairies hide in the
bellflowers. What a captivating story.
[Page]
It's a little sad, but I am sure she
will understand if you take that
flower to her.
[Page]
Now then, I again thank you for your
hard work. Here is the reward, and I
hope to have your help next time.

Original: Welcome back. You look proud of
yourselves... Was there a fairy?
[Page]
Hm? This was left behind? Is it a
ring? No... Oh!
Translation: Welcome back. You look proud of
yourselves... Was there a fairy?
[Page]
Hm? This was left behind? Is it a
ring? No... Oh!

Original: Gracious... so that's what happened.
I definitely do not think this was
made by human hands.
[Page]
But you never know what might dwell
in an unknown labyrinth.
[Page]
There were Vessels in this world, and
Sentinels as well. Why not a fairy
or two?
[Page]
I am glad, though. I didn't want to
disappoint her by giving her nothing
but a bellflower.
[Page]
She had a keen eye to choose the
[Guild] Guild. Just what I'd expect
from our beloved Atelier girl.
[Page]
Now then, I again thank you for your
hard work. Here is the reward, and I
hope to have your help next time.
Translation: Gracious... so that's what happened.
I definitely do not think this was
made by human hands.
[Page]
But you never know what might dwell
in an unknown labyrinth.
[Page]
There were Vessels in this world, and
Sentinels as well. Why not a fairy
or two?
[Page]
I am glad, though. I didn't want to
disappoint her by giving her nothing
but a bellflower.
[Page]
She had a keen eye to choose the
[Guild] Guild. Just what I'd expect
from our beloved Atelier girl.
[Page]
Now then, I again thank you for your
hard work. Here is the reward, and I
hope to have your help next time.

Original: Oh, ya took my request! Huh? Da thing
I tried ta give da bar lady?
[Page]
Huh!? H...How didja know about dat!?
I told her ta keep quiet!
[Page]
Y...Ya don't need to worry about dat!
Now get out dere and find dat fairy!
Translation: Oh, ya took my request! Huh? Da thing
I tried ta give da bar lady?
[Page]
Huh!? H...How didja know about dat!?
I told her ta keep quiet!
[Page]
Y...Ya don't need to worry about dat!
Now get out dere and find dat fairy!

Original: Arrrgh! Ya're just not gonna let it
go, are ya!? Alright, alright...
[Page]
Well, uh... see... dis is a milk
pitcher like da kind ya pour inta tea.
[Page]
I was wondering if ya could put it by
a bellflower.
[Page]
Dat way, ya might meet a fairy! Dat's
what I read in a picture book a long
time ago, anyways.
[Page]
B-But it's just for fun, alright!?
If a fairy don't come, dat's A-OK
with me!
[Page]
Yup! I ain't care one little bit!
Dat's why I don't mind if ya go do
it instead! Yup!
Translation: Arrrgh! Ya're just not gonna let it
go, are ya!? Alright, alright...
[Page]
Well, uh... see... dis is a milk
pitcher like da kind ya pour inta tea.
[Page]
I was wondering if ya could put it by
a bellflower.
[Page]
Dat way, ya might meet a fairy! Dat's
what I read in a picture book a long
time ago, anyways.
[Page]
B-But it's just for fun, alright!?
If a fairy don't come, dat's A-OK
with me!
[Page]
Yup! I ain't care one little bit!
Dat's why I don't mind if ya go do
it instead! Yup!

Original: At the end of a small path, you find
an adorable, bell-shaped flower.
[Page]
Is this the bellflower rumored to have
some connection to fairies?
[Page]
In order to find the truth, you must
return here at night.
Translation: At the end of a small path, you find
an adorable, bell-shaped flower.
[Page]
Is this the bellflower rumored to have
some connection to fairies?
[Page]
In order to find the truth, you must
return here at night.

Original: As you walk the labyrinth under the
light of the moon, you stop and find
a bell-shaped flower at your feet.
[Page]
Is this the bellflower rumored to be
a fairy's hiding place? As you are
pondering that...
[Page]
You are witness to an astonishing
development! From within the flower,
a pale glow flies out!
[Page]
You try to tamp down your excitement
as you catch the floating object...
But it is no fairy; merely pollen.
[Page]
It is little wonder that some mistake
this luminous pollen for fairies.
[Page]
You may pluck the flower and take it
with you if you wish to disprove the
existence of the fairies.
Translation: As you walk the labyrinth under the
light of the moon, you stop and find
a bell-shaped flower at your feet.
[Page]
Is this the bellflower rumored to be
a fairy's hiding place? As you are
pondering that...
[Page]
You are witness to an astonishing
development! From within the flower,
a pale glow flies out!
[Page]
You try to tamp down your excitement
as you catch the floating object...
But it is no fairy; merely pollen.
[Page]
It is little wonder that some mistake
this luminous pollen for fairies.
[Page]
You may pluck the flower and take it
with you if you wish to disprove the
existence of the fairies.

Original: An adorable, bell-shaped flower
blooms at your feet...
[Page]
You may pluck the flower and take it
with you if you wish to disprove the
existence of the fairies.
Translation: An adorable, bell-shaped flower
blooms at your feet...
[Page]
You may pluck the flower and take it
with you if you wish to disprove the
existence of the fairies.

Original: [Color:5]Pluck the bellflower?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Pluck the bellflower?[Color:0]

Original: With that, the request is complete.
All that remains is to report back
and deliver the flower.
Translation: With that, the request is complete.
All that remains is to report back
and deliver the flower.

Original: You leave the bellflower untouched
before withdrawing from the area.
Translation: You leave the bellflower untouched
before withdrawing from the area.

Original: As you walk the labyrinth under the
light of the moon, you stop and find
a bell-shaped flower at your feet.
[Page]
Is this the bellflower rumored to be
a fairy's hiding place? As you are
pondering that...
[Page]
You are witness to an astonishing
development! From within the flower,
a pale glow flies out!
[Page]
You try to tamp down your excitement
as you catch the floating object...
But it is no fairy; merely pollen.
[Page]
It is little wonder that some mistake
this luminous pollen for fairies.
[Page]
You may pluck the flower to complete
the request, or try the method you
were shown at the Berund Atelier.

light of the moon, you stop and find
a bell-shaped flower at your feet.
[Page]
Is this the bellflower rumored to be
a fairy's hiding place? As you are

[Page]
You are witness to an astonishing
development! From within the flower,
a pale glow flies out!
[Page]
You try to tamp down your excitement
as you catch the floating object...
But it is no fairy; merely pollen.
[Page]
It is little wonder that some mistake
this luminous pollen for fairies.
[Page]
You may pluck the flower to complete
the request, or try the method you

Original: An adorable, bell-shaped flower
blooms at your feet...
[Page]
You may pluck the flower to complete
the request, or try the method you
were shown at the Berund Atelier.
Translation: An adorable, bell-shaped flower
blooms at your feet...
[Page]
You may pluck the flower to complete

Original: [Color:5]Place the milk pitcher here?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Place the milk pitcher here?[Color:0]

Original: You fill the small pitcher, about the
size of your thumb, with milk before
placing it next to the bellflower.
[Page]
The preparations are thus complete.
If any fairies dwell here, you should
see some change in the milk pitcher.
[Page]
You resolve to move away from this
spot and return in [Color:5]one hour[Color:0].
Translation: You fill the small pitcher, about the
size of your thumb, with milk before
placing it next to the bellflower.
[Page]
The preparations are thus complete.
If any fairies dwell here, you should
see some change in the milk pitcher.
[Page]
You resolve to move away from this
spot and return in [Color:5]one hour[Color:0].

Original: The milk pitcher is still sitting next
to the bellflower, but you cannot see
anything that has changed.
[Page]
You suppose you ought to allot [Color:5]one
hour[Color:0] to stay clear of this area to
let the fairies feel safe.
Translation: The milk pitcher is still sitting next
to the bellflower, but you cannot see
anything that has changed.
[Page]
You suppose you ought to allot [Color:5]one
hour[Color:0] to stay clear of this area to
let the fairies feel safe.

Original: It has been one hour since you left
the milk pitcher alone. Perhaps the
time has come to check on it...
Translation: It has been one hour since you left
the milk pitcher alone. Perhaps the
time has come to check on it...

Original: You revisit the milk pitcher you set
down earlier... and swallow as you
find something changed.
[Page]
To your astonishment, the pitcher is
empty, and a tiny silver necklace no
larger than a ring was left behind!
[Page]
The fine details are exquisite... this
could not possibly have been crafted
at this size by a human.
[Page]
You are careful not to attach meaning
to the necklace, but take it back to
Tharsis as the result of your journey.
Translation: You revisit the milk pitcher you set
down earlier... and swallow as you
find something changed.
[Page]
To your astonishment, the pitcher is
empty, and a tiny silver necklace no
larger than a ring was left behind!
[Page]
The fine details are exquisite... this
could not possibly have been crafted
at this size by a human.
[Page]
You are careful not to attach meaning
to the necklace, but take it back to
Tharsis as the result of your journey.

Original: With this, the request is complete!
You think your client will be quite
satisfied once your report is in.
Translation: With this, the request is complete!
You think your client will be quite
satisfied once your report is in.
